verses.roman:
tomāra bhāi anupamera haila gaṅgā-prāpti
bhāla chila, raghunāthe dṛḍha tāra bhakti"

synonyms: tomāra bhāi—your brother; anupamera—of Anupama; haila—was; gaṅgā-prāpti—death; bhāla chila—he was a very good man; raghu-nāthe—unto Lord Raghunātha (Lord Rāmacandra); dṛḍha—firm; tāra bhakti—his devotion.
translation: "Your brother Anupama is now dead. He was a very good devotee who had firm conviction in Raghunātha [Lord Rāmacandra]."
